rows.label: qev027102_MSG0020
rows.name:
Mmmmm-MMM! This morning's breakfast pizza was
amazing, wasn't it? Now I'm all fueled up for a day
of saucy speeches![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0021
rows.name:
...Hmm? Who are you? A supporter here to cheer me
on, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_JNK0010
rows.name: Drug

rows.label: qev027102_SEL0011
rows.name:
Offer the drug to Adappin as
a special new pizza topping.

rows.label: qev027102_JNK0020
rows.name: Debate

rows.label: qev027102_SEL0021
rows.name:
Explain to Adappin that you have
concerns about his policies.

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0022
rows.name:
Oh, wow! That DOES looks tasty, doesn't it?
Well, go ahead and sprinkle it on. And don't be stingy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0023
rows.name:
This new topping is going to be AWESOME, isn't it?
I can't wait to to to try it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0024
rows.name: *Ohm nom narm nom snarf*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0025
rows.name:
...Huh. That new topping doesn't have any flavor,
does it? It also smells like...nothing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0026
rows.name:
...Which means my pizza tastes GREAT just like
ALWAYS, right?! Now I'm super full and super charged
to go about the people's business![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0027
rows.name:
Time to go to the big fountain on East Melville Street
and start preparing my big speech. ...*ahem!*
"We have nothing to fear but a lack of pizza, yes?"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0028
rows.name:
Heh. That's just a taste! Get it, yes? Taste? Pizza?
Anyway, see you later, friend. Or or sooner if you're
a supporter coming to listen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0029
rows.name:
Why? If I'm elected to the provisional government,
everybody wins, don't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0030
rows.name:
You BLADEs will get paid in in in pizza, won't you?
Which is DELICIOUS, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0031
rows.name:
So where's the problem? Humans love pizza,
so that's the end of the argument, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0001
rows.name: Fellow Ma-non! Lend me your ears, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0002
rows.name:
Humans are great most of the time, but some of them
like to make fun of us Ma-non, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0003
rows.name: Well, never again if if if you elect me to represent you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'll advance our agenda aggressively and effectively,
you know? They'll never underestimate us again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0005
rows.name:
But yes, there will be those who foolishly claim that
pizza is not the answer to every problem, won't there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0006
rows.name:
They will demand that we abandon our pizza platform
in favor of laissez-faire economicsâ€”whatever that is![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0007
rows.name:
But my response to them will be both firm and clear,
won't it? Will we compromise our vision? Will we
budge even one single inch from our goals, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0008
rows.name: ...YES WE WILL![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0009
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0010
rows.name:
They'll say we're making a mockery of politics,
won't they? But are we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0011
rows.name: ...WE SURE ARE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0012
rows.name:
They'll say Ma-non are wholly unqualified to lead, no?
But are we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0013
rows.name: ...ABSOLUTELY, YES![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0014
rows.name:
They'll say a system of government built on pizza is
ridiculous, yes? But is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0015
rows.name: ...YES IT IS![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0016
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0017
rows.name:
And it's that unwavering conviction that will force New
LA's government to embrace our policies, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0018
rows.name:
...Um, can you hear me in the back?
Is this thing on, even?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027102_MSG0019
rows.name: Er, what's wrong? Why all the awkward looks?[ST:wait ]
